QuestData.Title: I See Dead People
QuestData.Description: Everybody here be... dead.$B$BDis architect's spirit not be wantin' to fight us. Even in death he only be wantin' to work. Maybe we can break da haze over him and get to da bottom of dis.$B$BI bet one of da spectral laborers be havin' one of his schematics we can show to him to clear his mind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Bryan Finn's Schematic from Spectral Laborers.
